name: Kizuna AI - Touch the Beat!
description:
Say hello (morning!) to a new kind of rhythm game, and hang out in a virtual space with Kizuna AI!

■Game Overview
Kizuna AI: Touch the Beat is a rhythm game that features Kizuna AI.
Play in VR mode, or in a non-VR mode that does not require a VR headset.

This edition also includes a View Mode, which lets you travel through the game's stages free as a bird.If you want to hang out with Kizuna AI in VR, Kizuna AI: Touch the Beat is for you!

■VR Compatible
This game can be played on both your PC monitor and with SteamVR.


■Steam Deck Compatible
The rhythm portion of this game supports touch controls, and the View Mode supports both touch and gyro controls.

■Songs & DLC
Includes 15 popular songs performed by Kizuna AI, including her massive hit "Hello, Morning," which has garnered over 2,170,000 views.
Post-launch DLC is in the works, including additional songs and outfits, and other content.

■Product Specifications
Available Languages: Japanese, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, French
